module.name: sendinblue
module.description: Synchronize your PrestaShop contacts with SendinBlue platform & easily send your marketing and transactional emails and SMS
module.author: SendinBlue
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to remove the SendinBlue module? N.B: we will enable php mail() send function (If you were using SMTP info before using SendinBlue SMTP, please update your configuration for the emails)
